price: Wͻbεka sε: “Kane a na yεwͻ y’abusuafoͻ mu no (nyinaa) na yesuro (Nyankopͻn abufuo ne N’asotwee no).
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mush'fiqīna
